trans-unit.source: Represents a control that acts as a container for a group of controls within a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Representerer en kontroll som fungerer som en beholder for en gruppe kontroller i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: In this topic: - [Introduction](#introduction) - [Declarative Syntax](#declarative_syntax) ## Introduction The View control is a container for a group of controls.
trans-unit.target: I dette emnet:- [Introduksjon](#introduction) - [deklarerende syntaksen](#declarative_syntax) ## innføring i kontroll er en beholder for en gruppe kontroller.

trans-unit.source: A View control must always be contained within a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> control.
trans-unit.target: En kontroll må alltid være innenfor en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>

trans-unit.source: Only one View control at a time can be defined as the active view within a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> control.
trans-unit.target: Bare én kontroll på et tidspunkt kan defineres som den aktive visningen i en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.ActiveViewIndex%2A> property specifies the active View control within the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.Views%2A> collection of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> control.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.ActiveViewIndex%2A>egenskapen angir den aktive visningskontrollen i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.Views%2A>samling av en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.Views%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.ActiveViewIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: The active view control is rendered to the client, as long as the containing <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> control is visible.
trans-unit.target: Aktive visningskontrollen gjengis til klienten, så lenge inneholdende <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>kontrollen er synlig.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.Visible%2A> property to determine whether a View control and its child controls are visible on the page and rendered to the client.
trans-unit.target: Bruk av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.Visible%2A>til å fastslå om en kontroll og de underordnede kontrollene er synlig på siden og gjengitte til klienten.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.Visible%2A>

trans-unit.source: A View control can contain controls of any type, including other <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> controls.
trans-unit.target: En kontroll kan inneholde kontroller av en annen type, inkludert andre <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>Kontroller.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>

trans-unit.source: A View control does not support any style properties.
trans-unit.target: En kontroll støtter ikke alle stilegenskaper.

trans-unit.source: To apply styles to a View control, add one or more <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel> controls to the View control.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil bruke maler til en kontroll, må du legge til én eller flere <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel>Kontroller for å vise kontrollen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel>

trans-unit.source: The View class provides the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.Activate> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.Deactivate> events.
trans-unit.target: Vis klassen gir den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.Activate>og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.Deactivate>hendelser.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.Deactivate> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.Activate>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.Activate> event is raised when the current View control becomes the active view.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.Activate>denne hendelsen oppstår når den gjeldende visningskontrollen blir den aktive visningen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.Activate>

trans-unit.source: This occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.ActiveViewIndex%2A> property changes or the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.SetActiveView%2A> method is called to specify a different View control.
trans-unit.target: Dette skjer når verdien for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.ActiveViewIndex%2A>egenskapsendringer eller <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.SetActiveView%2A>-metoden for å angi en annen visningskontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.SetActiveView%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.ActiveViewIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, if `View1` is the active view within a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> control, when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.ActiveViewIndex%2A> property changes to specify `View2`, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.Activate> event is raised for `View2` and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.Deactivate> event is raised for `View1`.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel hvis `View1` er den aktive visningen i en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>kontroll, når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.ActiveViewIndex%2A>egenskapsendringer til å angi `View2`, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.Activate>hendelsen starter `View2` og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.Deactivate>hendelsen starter `View1`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.Deactivate> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.Activate> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.ActiveViewIndex%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>

trans-unit.source: To allow users to navigate between multiple View controls within a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> control, you can add a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button> control to each View control.
trans-unit.target: Tillat brukere å navigere mellom flere visningskontroller i en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>kontrollen, kan du legge til en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton>eller <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>kontrollen hver kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button> control's `CommandName` property to the ID of the View control to navigate to.
trans-unit.target: Angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton>eller <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>kontrollens `CommandName` egenskapen ID kontrollens visningen til å navigere til.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton>

trans-unit.source: For a code example, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.ActiveViewChanged>.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.ActiveViewChanged>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.ActiveViewChanged> for et kodeeksempel

trans-unit.source: For more information on manipulating View controls within a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> control, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> topic.
trans-unit.target: For mer informasjon om manipulering visningskontroller i en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>styre, kan du se den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>emnet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>

trans-unit.source: ## Declarative Syntax ``` ```
trans-unit.target: ## Deklarerende syntaks.``` ```

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.View"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.View"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.View"></xref> control becomes the active view.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når gjeldende <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.View"> </xref> blir den aktive visningen for kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The Activate event is raised when the current <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control becomes the active view.
trans-unit.target: Aktiver denne hendelsen oppstår når gjeldende <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>blir kontrollen den aktive visningen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>

trans-unit.source: This occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.ActiveViewIndex%2A> property changes or the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.SetActiveView%2A> method is called to specify a different <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control.
trans-unit.target: Dette skjer når verdien for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.ActiveViewIndex%2A>egenskapsendringer eller <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.SetActiveView%2A>metoden kalles for å angi en annen <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.SetActiveView%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.ActiveViewIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, if `View1` is the active view within a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> control, when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.ActiveViewIndex%2A> property changes to specify `View2`, the Activate event is raised for `View2` and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.Deactivate> event is raised for `View1`.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel hvis `View1` er den aktive visningen i en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>kontroll, når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.ActiveViewIndex%2A>egenskapsendringer til å angi `View2`, Aktiver denne hendelsen oppstår `View2` og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.Deactivate>hendelsen starter `View1`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.Deactivate> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.ActiveViewIndex%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the current active <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.View"></xref> control becomes inactive.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når det gjeldende aktivt <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.View"> </xref> kontrollen er inaktiv.

trans-unit.source: The Deactivate event is raised when the current active <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control becomes inactive.
trans-unit.target: Deaktiver denne hendelsen oppstår når det gjeldende aktivt <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>kontrollen er inaktiv.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control becomes inactive when the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.ActiveViewIndex%2A> property changes or the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.SetActiveView%2A> method is called to specify a different <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>blir kontrollen inaktiv når verdien for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.ActiveViewIndex%2A>egenskapsendringer eller <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.SetActiveView%2A>metoden kalles for å angi en annen <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.SetActiveView%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.ActiveViewIndex%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>

trans-unit.source: For example, if `View1` is the active view within a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> control, when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.ActiveViewIndex%2A> property changes to specify `View2`, the Deactivate event is raised for `View1` and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.Activate> event is raised for `View2`.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel hvis `View1` er den aktive visningen i en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>kontroll, når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.ActiveViewIndex%2A>egenskapsendringer til å angi `View2`, Deaktiver denne hendelsen oppstår `View1` og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.Activate>hendelsen starter `View2`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.Activate> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.ActiveViewIndex%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether themes apply to this control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om oppsett gjelder for denne kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The EnableTheming property indicates whether themes are enabled for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen EnableTheming angir om oppsett er aktivert for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>

trans-unit.source: The EnableTheming property also affects whether themes are enabled for the controls contained in its <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls%2A?displayProperty=fullName> collection.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen EnableTheming påvirker også om oppsett er aktivert for kontroller i den <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls%2A?displayProperty=fullName>samlingen.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: When the EnableTheming property is `true`, the application's theme directory is searched for control skins to apply.
trans-unit.target: Når egenskapen EnableTheming er `true`, programmappen tema søkes for Skallene for kontrollen skal gjelde for.

trans-unit.source: If no skin for the particular control exists in the theme directory, a skin is not applied.
trans-unit.target: Hvis det finnes ingen verktøylinje for bestemt kontrollen i mappen tema, brukes ikke et verktøylinje.

trans-unit.source: When the EnableTheming property is `false`, the theme directory is not searched and the contents of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.SkinID%2A> property are not used.
trans-unit.target: Når egenskapen EnableTheming er `false`, tema-mappen ikke søkes og innholdet i den <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.SkinID%2A>egenskapen er ikke brukt.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.SkinID%2A>

trans-unit.source: A control can override the EnableTheming value set by its parent control, or by the containing page.
trans-unit.target: En kontroll kan overstyre EnableTheming verdisettet den overordnede kontrollen eller siden som inneholder.

trans-unit.source: For example, if a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control has EnableTheming set to `false`, you can selectively apply themes to child controls contained within the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableTheming%2A> property to `true` on the individual child controls.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel hvis en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>kontrollen er satt til EnableTheming `false`, du kan velge om oppsett til underordnede kontroller innenfor den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>kontrollen ved å angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableTheming%2A>egenskapen `true` på individuelle underordnede-kontroller.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableTheming%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to use themes; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>bruke oppsett; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.Activate"></xref> event of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.View"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Hever den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.Activate"> </xref> hendelse av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.View"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.Activate> event is raised when the current <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control becomes the active view.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.Activate>denne hendelsen oppstår når gjeldende <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>blir kontrollen den aktive visningen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.Activate>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.EventArgs>som inneholder Hendelsesdata.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.Deactivate"></xref> event of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.View"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Hever den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.Deactivate"> </xref> hendelse av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.View"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.Deactivate> event is raised when the current active <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control becomes inactive.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.Deactivate>denne hendelsen oppstår når det gjeldende aktivt <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>kontrollen er inaktiv.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.Deactivate>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.EventArgs>som inneholder Hendelsesdata.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.View"></xref> control is visible.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.View"> </xref> kontrollen er synlig.

trans-unit.source: Use the Visible property to determine whether the current <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control is visible and rendered to the client.
trans-unit.target: Bruk egenskapen Visible til å fastslå om gjeldende <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>kontrollen er synlig og gjengitte til klienten.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>

trans-unit.source: For a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control to be visible on the rendered page, it must be the active view in its containing <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> control, and the containing <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> control must be visible.
trans-unit.target: For en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>kontrollere skal være synlige på den gjengitte siden, må den være aktiv visningen i den som inneholder <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>kontrollerer, og de inneholdende <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>kontrollen må være synlig.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>

trans-unit.source: If the containing <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> control is not visible on the page, or if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control is not the active view, then the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control and its child controls are not rendered.
trans-unit.target: Hvis inneholdende <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>kontrollen er ikke synlig på siden eller hvis den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>kontrollen er ikke den aktive visningen vil <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>kontroll og de underordnede kontrollene ikke gjengis.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The Visible property is set internally based on the visibility and active view for the containing parent control.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > For synlige settes internt basert på synlighet og aktive visningen for inneholdende overordnede kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: If you set this property at run time, an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du setter denne egenskapen ved kjøretid, en <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>unntak.</xref:System.InvalidOperationException>

trans-unit.source: If you set the Visible property at design time, any changes to the property are ignored.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du har angitt egenskapen Visible ved utformingen, ignoreres endringer for egenskapen.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.View"></xref> control is visible; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.View"> </xref> kontrollen er synlig; ellers, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to set this property at run time.
trans-unit.target: Forsøkte å angi denne egenskapen på kjøretidspunktet.
